description:
Free style courses is one of the most successful online learning style

This course is designed by "A+ FYsics" Graphic team to share the way we make our educational courses,

So this is the shortest way to accomplish your course professionally !

We are going show you what you need to know in order to keep up with the course.

You do NOT need camera or studio or Special room for lighting, just all you need is graphic pen tablet and microphone.

In this course we'll show you how :

• Install needed softwares and video codec.

• Adjusting your screen resolution and software settings.

• Modify pen size and use colors in your video.

• Record your screen.

• Design Intro for your lectures.

Learn what you need in short time and easy steps to get professional results !

FREE TEMPLATES INSIDE THE COURSE

Do not work hard. Work intelligent and start your business .
title: Make Your Educational Video Courses
